entry.title: Recycled Votive Guitar on the Compost

a.title: Recycled Votive Guitar on the Compost

img.alt: Recycled Votive Guitar on the Compost

div.p: I found this guitar at the cemetary where my father is buried. The instrument has been lying for a month or so on a grave together with reefs and other more traditional votives. Now it has been moved to the compost. For dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.
